briefTitle: A Study to Examine the Effect of Levodopa-Carbidopa Intestinal Gel (LCIG) Therapy Relative to That of Optimized Medical Treatment (OMT) on Non-motor Symptoms (NMS) Associated With Advanced Parkinson's Disease (PD)
officialTitle: An Open-label, Randomized 26-Week Study Comparing Levodopa-Carbidopa INteStInal Gel (LCIG) THerapy to Optimized Medical Treatment (OMT) on Non-Motor Symptoms (NMS) in Subjects With Advanced Parkinson's Disease - INSIGHTS Study

interventions.name: Percutaneous endoscopic gastrostomy with a jejunal (PEG-J) tube

summary: The primary objective of this study is to examine the effect of LCIG relative to that of OMT on NMS associated with PD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Week 26 in the NMSS Total Score
